archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: ? Wide Area Management System (WAMS) - GE
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
WAMS provides visibility that is based on real-time data streamed from Phasor Measurement Units (PMU). A host of WAMS software applications use this data to provide context-specific information, presented through an intuitive user interface. GEâ€™s WAMS solution complements traditional SCADA-based energy management to deliver fast and proactive grid stability management to meet the complex challenges of modern power systems.
https://www.ge.com/digital/applications/transmission/wide-area-management-system-and-control-wams-wamc https://www.ge.com/digital/sites/default/files/download_assets/wams-overview-from-ge-digital.pdf
